TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
They are stand up because when they stand up the bullies sit down on their donkeys. Clown Fu.

Does Jeb's Diner have soup?

Yes, it has so up, that only the stars can be upper.

Why are the Jeb's twin companions named Billibob and Bobbilly?

Edited yesterday at 05:58 AM by kerbiloid

They came from Petticoat Junction.

When did just having fun, become a competition?

Since human vanity made competing a fun.

If the comparable is compatible, why pay more for the authentic one?

I wouldn't, but most people are hypnotised by social media.

Will they stop before destroying all civilisation?

The civilisation is what they will finally keep having after.

Can a human stay physically sapient beyond the Earth atmosphere and magnetosphere?

On the assumption that they were sapient before hand, possibly.

Can you grow a tree house?

Easily. But the customers' mortgage will be long.

Where did they hide two other wheels of the bicycle?

The answer can be found in the first line of the song "Windmills of Your Mind"

Can you Tricycle before you buy?

I had a tricycle in my childhood. Much better than the stupid bicycles.
 

Spoiler

Somewhat like this one.


Why is the thing from the photo is being sold at the "fj" domain?
